Lowell.Old Chelmsford Garrison House: The "Old Chelmsford" Garrison House (also known as the Old Chelmsford Garrison House Complex) is a historic house at 105 Garrison Road in Chelmsford, Massachusetts. It is the oldest house in Chelmsford, and has been preserved by the Garrison House Society as a museum. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1973.
